descriptionHtml:
My first mod
2 hand tree makes me feel when you gain some levels, you only hit harder, it seems lack of technique
I made this to make me feel that when you train 2 hand, you replly get some technique  and more fun, too

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Eqj6pSvZGE0

+This mod change some perks of the 2handed perk tree

  - Barbarian perk now have 7 ranks, 25% damage per rank. 
  - Skullcrusher perk now apply to all 2 hand weapon.
  - Deepwound perk now do a little bit more critical damage.
  - GreatCriticalCharge perk remake: power foward attack and power side attack now knock enemy to the floor, but cost 50% more stamina
  - Sweep perk now apply to all 2 hand normal attack and power attack.
  - Backstab perk also apply to 2 hand weapon
  - Old warmaster perk does nothing at all. Now warmaster perk give 30% change to disarm target
.
  Knockdown effect sometime not work with the custom race. Can fix that by using CK to edit the condition of weaponknockbackeffect
